QuestData.Title: Dark Skies
QuestData.Description: The swarm begins, Wakener! The mantid amass at the Heart of Fear.$B$BAlready they fill the skies with their wings and rend the earth with their claws. They shall not stop the dark march until their bodies are laid open and bleeding upon the ground.$B$BThis we shall gladly do. We will attack them from above. While I fly, use my poisons to destroy their advance.$B$BDo not mix the two serums until you are ready to attack. The reaction can be quite... violent.$B$BSpeak to me when you are ready to go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 200 Mantid and 3 Kunchong or Dread Behemoths while flying with Xaril the Poisoned Mind.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Xaril the Poisoned Mind
